channel.title: G maul stance and glitch
channel.description:
I POSTED IN SERVER HELP BUT THE TOLD ME TO MOVE TO CLIENT.
MY gmaul is glitched on my delta, when i weild it i stand straight with hands down by my side close and legs+ feet together and holding gmaul out horizantaly and when i attack it shows the hitts and even spec works but some reason me nor the maul moves at all and idk why.. can some1 help me please?

item.title: G maul stance and glitch
item.dc:creator: @krunt_V3 krunt V3
item.description:
@krunt_V3 wrote:

yes its in right slot and it hits when i attack somthing and when i click spec 2time fast the spec even works like it is supose to… just no matter if im standing there or im attacking i stand there with hands by side and feet + legs together n maul holded straight out horizontaly(which is not right stance + cant even see me swinging with it when attacking) also ive just noticed when i walk with it on i do not move my legs or hands they stay in the same position and it looks as if my feet are just sliding across the ground…? ):

Read full topic

item.description:

Does the GMaul go in the right item slot?
